snippet: Once deemed the "next big thing" in tennis, 2009 U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro grew so frustrated after needing three operations on his left wrist that he considered quitting the sport last year at age 27....
lead_paragraph: Once deemed the "next big thing" in tennis, 2009 U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro grew so frustrated after needing three operations on his left wrist that he considered quitting the sport last year at age 27.

headline.print_headline: After 3 Wrist Operations, Del Potro Returns to Slam Tennis
headline.main: After 3 Wrist Operations, Del Potro Returns to Slam Tennis
